    SQLAlchemy Memcached Example

Welcome to my quick example of using memcached with SQLAlchemy. These examples
assume that you have installed:
    SQLAlchemy 0.5.2
    python-memcached 1.43
    memcached 1.2.2-1, running on 127.0.0.1:11211

Contents:
    database.py - The orm objects to interract with memcached
    LICENSE.txt - GPL License
    README.txt - This file...i think. ;)
    user_classes.py - The user ORM classes, builds the example database
    user_delete.py - Deletion example
    user_fetch.py - Fetch example
    user_populate.py - Populates Memcached
    user_update.py - Update example


John Hoff
Mad Scientist
The Braindonor Network
http://www.braindonor.net/
